title: Feature request: last played with info
body:
Hi all!

So I play with quite a few people and get friend requests after games fairly often... unfortunately because of name changes or just sheer time since I last played with them I often find myself having no idea who is trying to invite me to a game... So to deal with this I was wondering if a "Last played with" infobit could be added to the dialog popup that shows when you hover over someone in your friend list. Something small that said something like:
> "You last played with Faker on 24/7/16. Faker played Le Blanc. Faker was known as Hide on Bush then."

I would love it if a feature like this could be added to the client. Perhaps something to add into the new LCU?

Anyways, good luck with the games all!
